resourceDetails.Description: The resource details of the health report

environmentDetails.Description: The environment details of the resource

healthDataClassification.Description: The classification of the health report

status.Description: The status of the health report

affectedDefendersPlans.Description: The affected defenders plans by unhealthy report

issues.Description: A collection of the issues in the report

source.Description: The status of the health report

id.Description: The azure id of the resource

nativeResourceId.Description: The native resource id of the resource (in case of Azure - the resource Id, in case of MC - the native resource id)

environmentHierarchyId.Description: The hierarchy id of the connector (in case of Azure - the subscription Id, in case of MC - the hierarchyId id)

organizationalHierarchyId.Description: The organizational hierarchy id of the connector (in case of Azure - the subscription Id, in case of MC - the organizational hierarchyId id)

component.Description: The component describes the name of the agent/service that scans the issue

scenario.Description: The scenario describes the health scenario issue of the component

scope.Description: The resource scope of the health report

code.Description: The status of the health report

statusChangeDate.Description: The date of when the status of the health report was changed in the last time

firstEvaluationDate.Description: The date of when the resource of the health report was scanned in the first time

securityValues.Description: The affected security values that MDC offers that will be affected by the issue, for example: recommendations, alerts, etc

remediationSteps.Description: Human readable description of what you should do to mitigate this health issue

remediationScript.Description: The remediation script to solve this issue

issueAdditionalData.Description: Additional data for the given issue. The additional data depends on the issue type
